name: Metapilot
description: Designed with top experts from Boeing, the UK Government, and several EVTOL companies, Metapilot gives you the real EVTOL flight experience! Fly your aircraft around the city, pick up your guests from skyscrapers on time, and don't run out of fuel! Bring the future one step closer by playing Metapilot now. The game features a realistic experience of flying an airtaxi in a city with skyscrapers! Take off in your airtaxi, follow the arrow, find your passenger and park to retrieve them safely. Once you picked them up, bring them to their destination, taxi style, without bumping into buildings, or running out of fuel and time! At the end of every session, your progress will be saved. Enjoy the game for free for one hour, and your purchase will include customized experiences, multiple airtaxi types built together with the top 10 airtaxi companies, increasing difficulty, and an overall adrenaline rush!
